reapack.name: mrtnz_fast sidechain from selected tracks to track under mouse.lua
reapack.desc: Fast sidechain from selected tracks to track under mouse

metadata.description: This script provides quick sidechain routing from selected tracks to the track under the mouse, establishing a 3/4 sidechain by default with corresponding 3/4 LR pins for input. After selecting tracks, hovering over a track to set up a sidechain for a specific plugin opens a window displaying the plugins. Clicking on a specific plugin creates a sidechain to the pins of that plugin. The script supports two languages: English and Russian. The language can be changed by modifying the 'local language' line from 'eng' to 'ru'.
Your repository description here. This will be shown when using ReaPack's "About this repository" feature.
